New Records: India won the match by 71 runs
Key Match Events: India secured qualification to the semi-finals
Zimbabwe's batting struggled throughout the match
Pre-Game Insights: India had already qualified for the semi-finals due to South Africa's loss
Rohit Sharma's team faced challenges in previous matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first meeting between India and Zimbabwe in a T20 World Cup
Virat Kohli was close to 4000 T20I runs
Others: The match was played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground
Suryakumar Yadav was 35 away from 1000 T20I runs in 2022
